task: Calculate the mass of Jupiter compared to Earth using Wolfram Alpha. Also, find the length of one day on Jupiter.
Calculate the mass of Jupiter compared to Earth using Wolfram Alpha. Also, find the length of one day on Jupiter.
user_action_and_explanation: type 'mass of Jupiter compared to Earth' into the search bar with the placeholder 'Enter what you want to calculate or know about', then press enter to search for the relevant information.
observation: The search for the mass of Jupiter compared to Earth was successful. According to Wolfram Alpha, the mass of Jupiter is 1.898 x 10^27 kilograms, whereas the mass of Earth is 5.97 x 10^24 kilograms. Relative to Earth, Jupiter's mass is approximately 317.8 times larger. However, the user has not yet searched for the length of one day on Jupiter.

task: Calculate the mass of Jupiter compared to Earth using Wolfram Alpha. Also, find the length of one day on Jupiter.
